allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify implementation to focus on S3 Vectors and HDBSCAN clustering

- Remove simple-s3 storage backend and VectorStore abstraction
- Remove example.ts, test files, and vector-store-factory
- Update merge-documents.ts to only merge clusters with >2 documents
- Simplify configuration to S3 Vectors only
- Update CLAUDE.md with streamlined workflow documentation
- Clean up package.json scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add dotenv support to load .env file automatically

- Install dotenv package
- Import dotenv/config at the top of merge-documents.ts
- Environment variables from .env now load automatically

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add reindex command to force regeneration of embeddings

- Add --reindex flag to merge-documents.ts
- Delete all embeddings from S3 Vectors when --reindex is used
- Add npm scripts: reindex and reindex:aws
- Update CLAUDE.md with reindex command documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
